turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey John, I need you to order me a cup of coffee from Starbucks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hello, okay and how would you like me to accomplish this?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want you to order me a Black and White from Starbucks on Main Street

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything specific that you would like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well, I would like a tall size and an extra shot of espresso.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So you want me to order a Tall Black and White with an extra shot of espresso?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Where did you want me to order it from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I told you I wanted you to order it online for me to pick it up at the Starbucks on Main Street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I've got it now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How long will it take before it's ready?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hold on John, I'm getting ready to place the order now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay John, I just placed your order for a tall black and white with an extra shot of espresso.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You didn't tell me what Starbucks you ordered from and when it will be ready.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I ordered it for you to pick it up at the Starbucks on Main Street.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks, and what time will it be ready?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It should be ready in 30 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, I will be there in 30 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Enjoy

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks you're a life saver.
